review_text: I've taking AP courses most of my educational life and this was a wonderful  way to bring the skills instilled in me over the years to the forefront of my mind when trying to educate and brand myself as a qualified, and articulate copywriter. This course was definitely useful and worth the cost. I also completed it in one night without boredom . Your money is not wasted here. Ask me directly on IG if you think this is a bot review  @jessi.len .

I have a degree in Writing and I still took a significant amount of knowledge away from this course, frankly I feel I got a bargain. 

However, I donâ€™t know why the director, director of photography, AD, or frankly ANY crew member on this set did not give the poor instructor some bloody chapstick. Did you hate the guy?

This is the first course I followed from start to end with a strong focus. I wrote this review based on the technics I learned from the amazing Shani. In a simple, clear, and elegant style: I enjoyed the journey and the content is perfect.
Script-changing course, very well done. An eloquent speaker and well delivered.
The course presents articulate suggestions with logical progression at a comfortable pace. It will definitely improve my copy editing.
It was very clear. I only wish he ran through creating his own work. From assignment to the end of editing.

I have been trained in law school to write in legalese and passive sentences. This course started with the 4 rules to write clearly and succinctly. I also like the tips on editing for communicating effectively. I would be applying these copy-writing techniques in building my online presence and authority in my area of practice. Thank you very much for this, Shani!
I learned a lot from this course.Basic copy writing and editing techniques now guarded me to shape a valuable content.The learners spoke very simply and taught the skills effectively.
I liked the rhythm of the course and the simplicity of ideas. Thanks for sharing and for helping me out!
Excellent! Very clear and well paced. Easy to understand with insightful content. Highly recommend.
more about the mechanics of writing than how to be a great copywriter. great course if that is what one is looking for but i was looking more for copywriting content, not structure or style

The course gave a great overall viewpoint of how to make your writing better. However, the subtitles were incorrect in a lot of places, which should be looked into as the clarity is lost in some places, which, given the course topic, is not ideal.
I really liked the way this author simplifies all the concepts. It makes it very easy to understand and apply.
Very informative. The style and flow of the course make the content "easy to digest".
A lot of valuable information is packed into this course. I am looking forward to applying the new techniques that I learned.
